title: Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal threads, some paint
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White taffeta ground with vertical stripes of flat silver brocade. Meandering stripes of floral designs both painted and woven.
